medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain started 9 hours prior to presentation in the ED after eating a cheeseburger and fries. Pain is described as bandlike across the RUQ, constant, without radiation, and not colicky. No recent stool changes noted.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Obesity, OSA, HTN, carpal tunnel syndrome, multiple burn surgeries; no prior abdominal surgery.
